<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.72</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Custom Panels </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Opens given component or first component of given component type on specified info panel. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[setInfoPanel]] [infopanelId, componentClassOrType]; </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> infoPanelId: [[String]] - info panel classname, or "left" or "right" </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> componentClassOrType: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if panel was successfully opened, [[false]] otherwise (e.g. opening GPS on player without GPS item or setting panel to vehicle that doesn't have such capability configured) </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code><template><title>codecomment</title><part><name index="1"/><value>//opens slingload assistant on right panel</value></part></template>
_result = [[setInfoPanel]] ["VehicleSystemsDisplayManagerComponentRight", "SlingLoadDisplayComponent"];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Arma 3 Custom Info]], [[infoPanel]], [[infoPanels]], [[infoPanelComponents]], [[enableInfoPanelComponent]], [[infoPanelComponentEnabled]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
